Account.name: This is your username, you can change at any time
Account.email: You will need your email address to log in
Account.classroom: Use a classroom code to join a classroom a load a word list
Account.studentid: Add your student ID for indentification in the classroom

Dictionary.input: Search dictionary by first letter or combination of letters
Dictionary.dictTabs: PICT - add pictures and sentences to words ; STAR - view/edit/clear star word list ; TEST - Hide vocab list and test with sound
Dictionary.sortTabs: Sort your vocab by difficulty; (--) Problem words (-) Weak words (0) Neutral words (+) Good words (++) Strong words

Toolbar.transEng: WORDS - choose 6-30 words; CHOICES - set 3/4/5 answer choices; SOUND:; - Exam Mode (hide answer / play audio); - Auto Mode (show answer / play audio); - None (show answer / no audio); LABELS - show grammar labels in test; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice
Toolbar.transCh: WORDS - choose 6-30 words; CHOICES - set 3/4/5 answer choices; MODE:; - Exam Mode (choose by listening); - Spelling (choose by spelling mistake); - Normal (choose by reading); LABELS - show grammar labels in test; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice
Toolbar.typeTest: WORDS - choose 6-30 words; SOUND:; - English (play English audio); - Chinese (play Chinese audio); - None (no audio); DISPLAY:; - Chinese (show Chinese only); - Labels (show grammar label only); - None (show no Chinese or labels); FEEDBACK:; - Constant (spelling feedback always on); - Complete (feedback after word completed); - None (exam mode - no feedback given); ASSIST - choose blank for exam mode or choose another mode to assist your typing skill; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice
Toolbar.TransEng: Match Mode - challenger can choose settings, match will start with both player select 'Ready'; WORDS - choose 6-30 words; CHOICES - set 3/4/5 answer choices; TIMER - decide how long is allowed for opponents second choice; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice
Toolbar.TransCh: Match Mode - challenger can choose settings, match will start with both player select 'Ready'; WORDS - choose 6-30 words; CHOICES - set 3/4/5 answer choices; TIMER - decide how long is allowed for opponents second choice; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice
Toolbar.TypeMatch: Match Mode - challenger can choose settings, match will start with both player select 'Ready'; WORDS - choose 6-30 words; ASSIST - choose blank for exam mode or choose another mode to assist your typing skill; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice
Toolbar.MemoryMatch: AI Mode - the bot has 3 levels for you to try and beat; Memory Card Game:; Trans - translate vocab; English - all English vocab; 1/1 take turns; >>> correct answer can continue; Show All - All vocab is visible; WORDS - choose 6-12 words; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice
Toolbar.AITransEng: AI Mode - the bot has 3 levels for you to try and beat, match will start when you select ready; WORDS - choose 6-30 words; CHOICES - set 3/4/5 answer choices; TIMER - you have 6 seconds to choose after AI makes a mistake; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice; CHECK ANSWERS - after match, check answers/scores then have rematch or exit
Toolbar.AITransCh: AI Mode - the bot has 3 levels for you to try and beat, match will start when you select ready; WORDS - choose 6-30 words; CHOICES - set 3/4/5 answer choices; TIMER - you have 6 seconds to choose after AI makes a mistake; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice; CHECK ANSWERS - after match, check answers/scores then have rematch or exit
Toolbar.AIMemoryMatch: AI Mode - the bot has 3 levels for you to try and beat, match will start when you select ready; Memory Card Game:; Trans - translate vocab; English - all English vocab; 1/1 take turns; >>> correct answer can continue; Show All - All vocab is visible; WORDS - choose 6-12 words; SORT - load a list from starred words or words that are easier or harder from your practice; CHECK ANSWERS - after match, check answers/scores then have rematch or exit
Toolbar.answers: NEW - start a new test; REDO - redo the last test words; SETUP - change test settings; CHECK ANSWERS:; - see correct answers; - select vocab to play audio ; mark star words for later practice
Toolbar.games: Welcome to the Game Zone; First, choose your game style;  - English to Chinese; - Chinese to English; - Spelling (typing match); - Memory Match; Then, choose your opponent and wait for them to accept challenge; If someone challenges you, then accept or decline; If no classmates are online, challenge the AI Bot
